title: OnePlus 9RT gets unofficial LineageOS 19 and Pixel Experience ROMs based on Android 12L
content:
OnePlus is sweating it hard to improve its ColorOS-flavored OxygenOS 12 UI to be more user-friendly and less buggy. The stable version of the software is already available for users of the OnePlus 9 and OnePlus 8 series. It’s also available as a closed beta for the OnePlus 9RT. However, if youâ€™re among those who

The post OnePlus 9RT gets unofficial LineageOS 19 and Pixel Experience ROMs based on Android 12L appeared first on XDA.
description: You can now install unofficial Pixel Experience 12 and LineageOS 19 custom ROMs based on Android 12L on the OnePlus 9RT. Read on!
